review: Amazon sent me another remote, which works perfectly fine. Hopefully this new remote will not chew through batteries, so we'll see. Assuming that it won't, then all I can say is that Fire TV is better than Apple TV or even using the Xbox to watch Amazon, Netflix, HBO Go, etc. As of right now, I am extremely pleased with this product, and even more extremely pleased with Amazon's customer service! Well done Amazon!!!
author: By BizeeMama2

review: Very excited to purchase and use this product. Set up was easy....I used it 2 or 3 times and loved it. Went to use it again and the device was broken. Wouldn't even turn on. Tried resetting it, tried a different HDMI cord, tried a different TV; all with negative results. I am sending it back for a refund. Afterwards, I read multiple reviews saying the same thing happened to them which makes me hesitant to buy another one.
